name: Big Bumpin'
description: Big Bumpin' is based on bumper cars, featuring characters familiar to Burger King, like the Subservient Chicken, Brooke Burke, and the Burger King himself. Obstacles in the arenas ("theme parks") include pits and saws. Players can gain power-ups which allow them to deal specific damages. The arenas include the Ice Box, Broiler, King's Court, The Deep, and Monsoon of Doom. The game supports up to four players, as well as up to eight using Xbox Live.
